subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: In a year when several players are skipping the Scottish Open, Phil Mickelson tops the field at Loch Lomond, which also features the United States Open champion Graeme McDowell.
snippet: In a year when several players are skipping the Scottish Open, Phil Mickelson tops the field at Loch Lomond, which also features the United States Open champion Graeme McDowell.
